p.q.r = 1

package test

a.b contains x if some x in [1,2,3]

	data.test.a = x

	data.test.a.b = x
}

b.c.d contains 2 if true

package test
import future.keywords

a.b.c = "d" if true
a.b.e = "f" if true
a.b.g contains x if some x in numbers.range(1, 3)

	data.test.a.b = x
